summary:
Minneapolis Housekeeping staff contacted the ISO to report that 3 bags of trash containing sensitive information had been found in two areas of the facility.
Incident Update
The contents of the bags were:
Bag #1 found in room 2V114 contained the following:
2 prescription authorizations for eyeglasses containing name, full SSN, DOB, eyeglass prescription and the Date of service
1 Confidential Medical worksheet summary containing name, last 4 of the SSN and Date of service Bags #2 and #3 found in room 3V182 contained the following:
5 labels containing name, full SSN, DOB, and allergies.
Therefore 7 Patients will recieve a letter offering credit protection services and 1 Patient will receive a notification letter.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
